pages.title: Ruby Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Ruby Armour you will need one Infused Ruby per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Ruby goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Ruby Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Ruby Armour to Gain a Permenant Haste Boost
